briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Intrathecally Administered RO7234292 (RG6042) in Participants With Manifest Huntington's Disease
officialTitle: A Randomized, Multicenter, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Phase III Clinical Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Intrathecally Administered RO7234292 (RG6042) in Patients With Manifest Huntington's Disease
summary: This study will evaluate the efficacy, safety, and biomarker effects of RO7234292 (RG6042) compared with placebo in participants with manifest Huntington's disease (HD)

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in the Composite Unified Huntington's Disease Rating Scale (cUHDRS) Score-Z Score
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Weeks 21 for ODC and 69 for NDC
